Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • Resource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Book, DVD, LaptopComputer

    public class Resource
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class that creates a new Resource object.
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                java.lang.String year,
                java.lang.String image,
                int numOfCopies)
        Constructor for a resource.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the resource.
        year - Year of resource release.
        image - Cover image for the resource.
        numOfCopies - How many copies exist of the resource in the library.
